name: leaflet-trackdrawer
description: Enables drawing tracks using custom routing

scripts.browserify:polyfill: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-transform-runtime ] ] -t browserify-shim -p browserify-derequire -o dist/leaflet.trackdrawer.polyfill.js src/index.js
scripts.browserify:noruntime: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -t browserify-shim -p browserify-derequire -o dist/leaflet.trackdrawer.js src/index.js
scripts.bundle:polyfill: npm run browserify:polyfill && npm run uglify:polyfill
scripts.bundle:noruntime: npm run browserify:noruntime && npm run uglify:noruntime
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:polyfill && npm run bundle:noruntime
scripts.doc: typedoc --out docs/ --ignoreCompilerErrors --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --name "Leaflet.TrackDrawer" --theme markdown --mdHideSources --readme none --mode file src/index.d.ts
scripts.validate: npm run bundle && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.version: npm run validate && npm run doc && git add docs dist
